content:
In this dataset, people are asked how polite they believe the text to be. 0 means polite, while 25 is impolite.

Predict the integer label of the following example:
Target Example:
Text: And wasting our time as well. I can only repeat: why don't you do constructive work by adding contents about your beloved Makedonia?
Annotation from annotator:
If you output anything other than a single integer (and absolutely nothing else, including explanatory text), your output will invalidate the dataset.
